price: 6. Xiddigaha iyo geedahuna way sujuudaan (Alle dartiis)1.
footnotes: 1. Xiddigaha waxaa caabudi jirey qaar ka mid ah Carabta waagii Jaahiliyadda. Halka xiddigaha iyo geeduhuba u sujuudaan Alle, oo u hoggaansan yihiin Xeerarkiisa.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.
